get.summary: Allows admin retrieve all bookings from the database
Allows admin retrieve a booking with given ID from database

parameters.description: ID of the booking to get
parameters.name: booking_id

put.summary: Allows admin update the status of an existing booking.

get.summary: Allows admin retrieves all orders from the database
Allows admin retrieves all orders with given status from the database
Allows admin retrieve an order with given ID from database

parameters.description: ID of the order to get
parameters.name: order_id

put.summary: Allows admin update the status of an existing order.

post.summary: Allows the admin add products to the database

put.summary: Allows the admin update the product with given product_id

parameters.description: The id of the product to update
parameters.name: product_id

delete.summary: Allows admins delete a product from the database

post.summary: Allows the admin add services to the database

put.summary: Allows the admin update the service with given service_id

delete.summary: Allows admins delete a service from the database

post.summary: Allows the admin add slots to the database

delete.summary: Allows admins delete a slot from the database

get.summary: Allows admin get all orders and bookings belonging to user with email.
Allows customer retrieves all their bookings from the database

post.summary: Allows customer add a new booking.

get.summary: Allows customer retrieve a booking with given ID from database

parameters.description: ID of the booking to get
parameters.name: booking_id

get.summary: Allows the customer retrieve all the items in their cart

post.summary: Allows the current user to add a new item to the cart

parameters.description: A new item to add to cart
parameters.name: item

delete.summary: Allows the current user all items in their cart.
Allows the current user delete an item from the cart.

parameters.description: The ID of the item to delete
parameters.name: item_id

get.summary: Allows the customer retrieve all their orders from the database.

post.summary: Allows the current user place a new order

get.summary: Allows the customer retrieve all the orders from the database with given status.

parameters.description: The status of orders to retrieve
parameters.name: status

get.summary: Allows customer retrieve an order with given ID from database

parameters.description: ID of the order to get
parameters.name: order_id

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all product objects
Retrieves a list of all products in given category
Retrieves the product with the given ID

put.summary: Allows to send new password details

post.summary: Allows to send a request for password update. A token is returned.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all product objects
Retrieves a list of the top ten trending services
Retrieves the service with the given ID

post.summary: Logs a user into their account

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all slot objects
Allows super_admin retrieve all admins in the database.
Allows super_admin retrieve all customers in the database.
Allows super_admin retrieve another user with given email

delete.summary: Allows super_admin delete another user's account.

put.summary: Allows super_admin update another user's role
Allows the current user update their account information.

delete.summary: Allows the current user delete their account.

service_id.description: ServiceID is the ID of the service requested.

slot_id.description: SlotID is the ID of the slot the user is requesting to be booked for.

product_id.description: ProductID is the id of the product the item represents.

quantity.description: Quantity is the number of the product for this order.

delivery_method.description:
DeliveryMethod is the method in which the order should be deliver.

Allowed values are `pickup`, `delivery`.

available.description: Available says whether the service is available or not.

description.description: Description is a brief description of the service.

name.description: Name is the name of the service.

price.description: Price is the cost of the service.

date_string.description: DateString is the date as a string. Format `Wednesday, 06 Jan 1999`

is_free.description: IsFree is a boolean that says if the slot is free or not.

time_string.description: TimeString is the time as a string. Format `04:00 AM`
